generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and a curved section, clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the building, with a curb separating it from the road.
- building: A multi-story building with windows and commercial signage is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and other greenery are visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a silver car in the foreground and several others in the distance.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole on the left side of the road.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including directional signs and regulatory signs.
- truck: A white van (a type of truck) is visible in the distance on the left side of the road.
